ygData.subject: AW: [eqbards] I have a question about Lambent
ygData.msgSnippet: the carpace from lower guk is nodrop, at least it was when i made lambent quests, dunno if they changed that. anyways, if you already have the lute on your
ygData.messageBody:
the carpace from lower guk is nodrop, at least it was when i made lambent
quests, dunno if they changed that. anyways, if you already have the lute on
your bard, you can multiquest the carpace.

tobi

Betreff: [eqbards] I have a question about Lambent

For the Lambent BP quest... has anyone done it within the last month or two?

Because to do it you need a carapace from Lower Guk,,, and on some websites
it says its no drop and the like below the details where players post a few
of them say that it is not no drop anymore and u can get it with any
character

I am wondering about this because i already have the gypsy lute and i wanna
know if i have to get carapace with the same guy or someone different?

If anyone know i could use the info... thanks bye

-Tom
